label: ham
subject: [perl #43171] [TODO] replace the value for $(MAKE) with the actual path (config/inter/make.pm)
body: 138. Now these were they who gave the vote between the two opinions, and were men of consequence in the eyes of the king, 124first the despots of the Hellespontians, Daphnis of Abydos, Hippoclos of Lampsacos, Herophantos of Parion, Metrodoros of Proconnesos, Aristagoras of Kyzicos, and Ariston of Byzantion, these were those from the Hellespont; and from Ionia, Strattis of Chios, Aiakes of Samos, Laodamas of Phocaia, and Histiaios of Miletos, whose opinion had been proposed in opposition to that of Miltiades; and of the Aiolians the only man of consequence there present was Aristagoras of Kyme.
